Association of Cyprus Banks 
Cyprus Employees & Industrialist Federation
goals__remit:
VISION 
To support every citizen, family and company to create a Cyprus of growth, prosperity and progress. 
  
MISSION 
To give young people and every creative force in our country opportunity, offering a serious and humane alternative banking option. 
To offer Cypriot citizens a comprehensive range of financial services which will be available to all, easily accessible and comprehensible but also competitively priced. 
To create for the people of the Co-operative Movement a secure, friendly and efficient working environment, giving them the scope to evolve with the Organisation. 
To contribute to society that trusts and supports us, by modernising and constantly upgrading our people-centric character.
